sentences.en: As a footballer, Le Saux's ability was beyond question.
sentences.cn: 作为一名足球运动员，勒索克斯的能力不容置疑。

sentences.en: Beyond a stand of trees a small plane idled.
sentences.cn: 在树林的那一边，一架小飞机停在那里，发动机在空转。

sentences.en: Beyond the river, cattle were grazing.
sentences.cn: 河的那边，牛在吃草。

sentences.en: But by the year 2020 business computing will have changed beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 但是到了2020年，商业计算会变得面目全非。

sentences.en: Even the relatively modest sum of £50,000 now seems beyond his reach.
sentences.cn: 现在即使是相对来说并不算多的5万英镑对他来说也是遥不可及的。

sentences.en: Few jockeys continue race-riding beyond the age of 40.
sentences.cn: 很少有职业赛马骑师超过40岁仍继续参加赛马的。

sentences.en: Giving an arsonist a lighter is beyond a joke.
sentences.cn: 把打火机交给纵火犯简直是不可理喻。

sentences.en: I have no doubt that we are polluting the environment beyond redemption.
sentences.cn: 我丝毫都不怀疑我们对环境的污染是不可挽回的。

sentences.en: Inflation has risen beyond the 5% level.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀已经超出了5%的水平。

sentences.en: It could engage the enemy beyond the range of hostile torpedoes.
sentences.cn: 从这可以避开敌方鱼雷区对敌人发动进攻。

sentences.en: It seems to me he's beyond caring about what anybody does.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，他不关心别人做什么。

sentences.en: Mankind's knowledge of the universe has increased beyond measure.
sentences.cn: 人类对于宇宙的了解已经大为增加。

sentences.en: More people are choosing to work beyond retirement age.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人选择过了退休年龄继续工作。

sentences.en: Now look yonder, just beyond the wooden post there.
sentences.cn: 看那边，就在木头柱子的旁边。

sentences.en: She drove through Westport, and stopped a few miles beyond at a wayside inn.
sentences.cn: 她驱车穿过西港，在几英里外的一个路边旅馆停了下来。

sentences.en: She had already achieved success beyond her wildest dreams.
sentences.cn: 她已经取得超乎想象的成功。

sentences.en: The financing of home ownership will continue through the 1990s and beyond.
sentences.cn: 房屋产权的融资将持续到20世纪90年代及以后。

sentences.en: There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: They crossed the mountains and headed for the valleys beyond.
sentences.cn: 他们翻过山，向更远处的山谷进发。

sentences.en: This sort of thing really is quite beyond the pale.
sentences.cn: 这种事情真是不可接受。

sentences.en: Two blocks beyond our school was a field where boys played football.
sentences.cn: 离我们学校两个街区远的地方有个男孩们玩橄榄球的球场。

words.tran_cn: 超过；越过；那一边；在...较远的一边

trans.tran_cn: 在…另一边，超过，超出，晚于，无法理解
trans.tran_en: more or greater than a particular amount, level, or limit
